::DarkMouse::

She placed the bag of ice on her jaw and walked to her console.
She sat down and picked up Akura.  She held Akura next toher good 
cheek and felt his soft fur against her face. "You know Akura, it's 
just you and me now." She held him up and looked at him.  His 
whiskers twitched and his eyes twinkled.  He reached out a little paw 
and tapped her nose.  She smiled and cuddled Akura.  She hekd the 
little rat close to her.  She stood up and put Akura back into his 
cage.  She put the cage on the floor under her computer console.  She 
didn't want Megatron seeing him and killing her pet.  She sat down 
and rested her head on her hands.
